name: Chemistry Campaign
description:
Welcome to Chemistry Campaign - the ultimate quest to forge your path toward scientific greatness!  Key Features:  Procedurally Generated Levels 

Each level is procedurally generated, meaning that there are infinite possibilities for levels! 

Projectiles Follow The Cursor 

The character will turn in the direction of your computer mouse and projectiles will be aimed at where your cursor is pointing! 

Customizable Keybinds 

Press escape to customize your key binds to whatever keys you want! 

Movement 

This game features left and right movement, jumping, dashing, wall sliding, and wall jumping!

Breakable Terrain

Some of the terrain is breakable.
